channel.title: !need npc help!
channel.description:
hey ppl im still working on my first server and 1.the training is pretty hard so how do i change the xp u get from every time u attacka npc?? and 2. how do u get npc's to not ifght bak when u fight them??3. also i need to know how to move then to a different place.. plz help
-Pure Jukes

item.title: !need npc help!
item.dc:creator: @Pure_jukes Pure jukes
item.description:
@Pure_jukes wrote:

is this for every npc or do u have to add it to each one?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 11:36:36 AM[/size][hr]oh nvm i got it

item.title: !need npc help!
item.dc:creator: @Luisinho Luisinho
item.description:
@Luisinho wrote:

Open up client.java then press Ctrl + F and search TotalExp = (double) (

And edit the value that goes next to it…

Hope it helps

Read full topic
